alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Marshall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto, northwestern Marshall, southwestern Fayette and southeastern Shelby Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Collierville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Memphis, Eads, Piperton, Rossville, Cayce, Fisherville, Kirk, Elba and Handy Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
